text: @Liz_Wheeler @realDonaldTrump This is so sad what the Governor’s and Mayors are allowing this to continue.   And they are not even wearing Mask’s.  This is how Covid-19 spreads.   But the rest of us have to abide by the states mandated orders and not allow us to go to church.  So sad.
